name: Sage (kattoria)
description:
Sage, a witch with a penchant for potion brewing, has just moved into a small town and opened up a shop. The inhabitants shortly begin asking for her help by way of potions. She can either help them or harm them, changing both her ending and theirs'. A choose your own adventure with multiple endings and many choices to make!

press the green text to make decisions and progress through the game! dialogue choices effect Sage's personality and potential ending for herself and her clients. you can play multiple times if you want to see the other outcomes!

27k words, typos and bugs are a given no matter how many times I've edited. if you run into an issue or even just a typo or extra bracket somewhere, please comment and I'll try to patch it asap!
